  • Our Deal

    We heard you make great, chill instrumental music. Let us:

    • Make your song sound amazing
    • Hook you up with artwork
    • Release it under your own Spotify artist
    • Promote it on our playlists and others
    • Introduce you to our great community

    In return, we ask for:

    • 50% of the streaming revenue of your song

    There's no upfront costs to you, and you keep all ownership over your music.
